pages.text: $(9)Obliteration$() is another brand new anvil exclusive enchantment.$(p)An obliteration anvil can convert a single enchanted book with exactly one enchantment into two enchanted books, each one level lower.

To use an obliteration anvil, throw an enchanted book into the world, and place the anvil so that it lands on top of the book.$(p)A book with Sharpness III that is obliterated would become two books, each with Sharpness II.
